body: I know right? I might as well make friends with such people ( IM not gay, not a cuck, just saying such people are very good to making friends with) & yeah the comedy here's good as well ! 😂
That Guy has some good movie choices
What's with all of the reuploads...
It is nice to have accurately translated works, but would it be nice to do it on the latest chapter(s) 1st?
i mean it's a reupload but the team pretty much outlined why they're doing it if you bothered to read it. They just want to do justice to the work by an author whose works they love.
For the first time, I'm actually glad that this is a reupload. Otherwise, I wouldn't have found such a gem. Shame there were wasn't enough sex.
Ah man.  I was expecting this to be uncensored finally.  I guess I'll just fap to a precious reupload.
